column1: #Text=Mai says : " Zuko , it 's just a dumb meeting .
#Text=I mean , why would you even want to go ?
#Text=Just think about how things went the last meeting you went to .
#Text=" Mai says : " You know what will make you feel better ?
#Text=I might be hungry for a whole tray of fruit tarts .
#Text=And maybe a little palanquin ride around town .
